text: tavada (‘mohu satya dūtayeki’ yayi sākṣi darannaṭa) ‘ek malāyikāvarayeku yæviya yutu novēda?’yi ovun pævasūha. (ovun kæmati vana andamaṭama) api ek malāyikāvarayeku yavā tibunē nam, (ovungē) kāraṇāva avasan vī tikhennaṭa iḍa tibuṇi! pasuva (ehi) ovunṭa kisima kāla avakāśayakda nolækhennaṭa iḍa tibuṇi. (evelēma ovun vināśa vī yannaṭa iḍa tibuṇi)
